api_list.name: upload-status
api_list.description: Get the current upload status for a particular `taskId`

required_parameters.name: taskId
required_parameters.description: The ID of the upload task

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://hybridsearch.p.rapidapi.com/v1/upload-status/123456"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hybridsearch.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://hybridsearch.p.rapidapi.com/v1/upload-status/{taskid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hybridsearch.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
